title: A Complete Guide to Life Path Number 1

steps.title: You’re a natural-born leader.
steps.content: You’re a natural-born leader. You’re at the head of the pack and have the motivation and drive to be a great leader to others. You're an ambitious go-getter who lends your strength to help pull others along. Others can often count on you to step up since you’re not afraid of the spotlight and the responsibilities that come with it. [1] X Research source

steps.title: You’re independent.
steps.content: You’re independent. You’re the kind of person who will forge ahead by carving out your own path in life. You embrace what makes you unique and don’t wait for others to tell you what to do. Being just another face in the crowd likely isn’t an option for you, and you show extreme courage in following your own path. [2] X Research source

steps.title: You are confident in yourself and don’t let others bring you down.
steps.content: You are confident in yourself and don’t let others bring you down. You exude confidence and find happiness in believing in yourself and following your passions. You don’t let other people's judgment and criticisms deter you from going your way, and you’re confident in your decision-making abilities. [3] X Research source

steps.title: You think outside of the box.
steps.content: You think outside of the box. Not only are you a great leader, but you are also an innovator. You likely have an entrepreneurial spirit and are full of unique and innovative ideas. Some might consider your visions to be unconventional at first, but you stick to your gut and see your goals out until the end. [4] X Research source

steps.title: You have the power to command and lead others.
steps.content: You have the power to command and lead others. Being a leader, much less a good leader, isn’t a skill that many possess. But you seem to have a natural instinct and knack for leading, and you are able to capture people’s attention effectively. You’re not afraid to step up into the spotlight, and this makes you all the more eye-catching to others. You know how to command people in a way that will bring them closer to achieving their goals, and your presence is one that fills an entire room. [5] X Research source

steps.title: You possess the ability to manifest your dreams.
steps.content: You possess the ability to manifest your dreams. You’re a doer, and you’re ready to put in the hard work and effort needed to reach your goals. Your dreams don’t just stay dreams, since you possess a rather unique ability to manifest anything you put your mind to. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Taking risks isn't all that scary to you.
steps.content: Taking risks isn't all that scary to you. The confidence you have in yourself makes you fearless even in the face of failure. Your determination easily outweighs any insecurity you may feel from others’ judgment, and your willingness to take risks contributes greatly to keeping the world moving forward. Without number 1s, we wouldn’t have many of the inventions we use today. We also wouldn’t have some of the fearless leaders who stepped up to call for change when change was most needed. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Your confidence runs the risk of turning into arrogance.
steps.content: Your confidence runs the risk of turning into arrogance. While it’s great that you embrace your individuality and unique talents, focusing too much on yourself can lead you to become egotistical and arrogant. When others can’t keep up with their pace, some number 1s have the tendency of looking down on them and being unforgiving of their shortcomings. Empathizing with others and keeping in touch with your emotional side is one way to avoid such arrogance. [8] X Research source

steps.title: You might not take orders well from others.
steps.content: You might not take orders well from others. Your sense of independence makes you ideal for leading innovation and new ventures, but can also cause you to be rather reluctant when it comes to taking orders from your peers. It may be difficult for you to realize when it’s time to take a step back and let someone else lead, and this can cause arguments to break out. [9] X Research source

steps.title: You may be a little prone to insecurity.
steps.content: You may be a little prone to insecurity. Despite your confident exterior, you might still have a little voice in the back of your head constantly telling you that you’re not enough. If you let these insecurities rule your life and can’t overcome them , it can become more difficult to achieve your goals. [10] X Research source

steps.title: You're drawn to careers that require innovation and leadership.
steps.content: You're drawn to careers that require innovation and leadership. As a natural-born leader, you have the potential to excel in positions where you can exude a positive influence over others. You’re probably not the type to shy away from responsibility and will be well-suited for managerial positions. You may also be looking for careers that will let you think creatively and test out your innovative ideas. Some good careers for a number 1 include: [11] X Research source Teaching Politics Architecture Engineering Entrepreneurism Writing Freelance work

steps.title: Two number 1s paired together have potential but can also be potent.
steps.content: Two number 1s paired together have potential but can also be potent. Putting these two powerful figures together creates the possibility for great things to be achieved. Each is aware of the other’s ambitions and goals, and they may be able to use their shared drive to help each other to reach these goals. However, number 1 can also be very stubborn. If there’s no give and take in the relationship, it has the potential of fizzling out. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Number 1 and number 2 are compatible as long as they know who the leader is.
steps.content: Number 1 and number 2 are compatible as long as they know who the leader is. They each have things they excel in. Number 1 is great at leading others and getting things done, while number 2 is the empath who is good at creating emotional connections with others. While this can make them a well-rounded couple, it can also lead to conflict if each person isn’t understanding of the other’s approach to life. Communication is the key to a good relationship here. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Number 1 and number 3 can have a happy and long-lasting relationship.
steps.content: Number 1 and number 3 can have a happy and long-lasting relationship. These two would likely be the “fun couple” amongst their group of friends, as they’re both incredibly charismatic and energetic. Together they can overcome any challenge, combining number 1’s forceful personality and number 3’s lightness of heart. While they may have different ways of approaching responsibility, it’s their similar levels of energy that makes them so compatible. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Number 1 and number 4’s relationship is prone to crashing and burning.
steps.content: Number 1 and number 4’s relationship is prone to crashing and burning. What might seem like a solid relationship at the onset could easily take a downward spiral. Number 1 can be very self-centered and impatient, while number 4 is a by-the-book follower of the rules. If number 1 can respect number 4’s need for stability, and number 4 can recognize number 1’s desire to pursue new interests, then maybe their relationship can work out. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Number 1 and number 5 build off of each other’s strengths.
steps.content: Number 1 and number 5 build off of each other’s strengths. Together, these two can reach new heights and come together in a type of bond that is electrified and charged with energy. Such intensity does run the risk of leading to things like addiction or laziness, but this can be kept in check so long as the two keep their adventurism under control. [16] X Research source

steps.title: Number 1 and number 6 will be lucky to have found one another.
steps.content: Number 1 and number 6 will be lucky to have found one another. Number 6 is one of the most peaceful and harmonious of all the life path numbers, while number 1 is extremely protective of and loyal towards the ones they care about. Number 1 will make number 6 feel secure, and their relationship will be long-lasting and free of a lot of the drama that others can experience. [17] X Research source The only downside is that number 1 may view number 6’s tendency to easily forgive and compromise as a weakness. So it’s important that they remember that it’s okay to have different views and not judge one another for how they interact with the world. Reader Poll: We asked 128 wikiHow readers what their primary motivation for seeking a romantic partner is, and 54% of them said to find emotional support and connection. [Take Poll] A relationship between a 1 and a 6 is often emotionally secure and supportive.

steps.title: Number 1 and number 7 are a wildcard pair.
steps.content: Number 1 and number 7 are a wildcard pair. They can either thrive or fizzle out. They’re both intellectuals who aren’t afraid to ask big questions, and so will be good for each other when it comes to finding someone to match minds with. However, they’re both pretty reserved when it comes to divulging matters of the heart. So if they want to make it, it’s important that they work on their communication and opening up to one another. [18] X Research source

steps.title: Number 1 and number 8’s stubborn personalities can cause them to butt heads.
steps.content: Number 1 and number 8’s stubborn personalities can cause them to butt heads. These two are both very strong-willed people and don’t like to be dominated. They each want to be the one calling the shots, and this can lead to lots of conflict and unnecessary competitiveness in a relationship. If they can compromise and communicate their wants and needs with one another every day, then maybe they can make this relationship work. [19] X Research source

steps.title: Number 1 and number 9’s arrogance doesn’t bode well for a relationship.
steps.content: Number 1 and number 9’s arrogance doesn’t bode well for a relationship. Both have a tendency to be egocentric, and they often find it hard to understand the other’s perspective. They’re stubborn and clash often, so the key to a good relationship is distance. They need to be more independent of one another. The dynamic of a 1 and 9 is best between friends, business partners, and parents and children. It’s not the ideal combination for romance. [20] X Research source

steps.title: These celebrities also have life path number 1.
steps.content: These celebrities also have life path number 1. They lead the charge and aren’t afraid to be themselves. Some celebrities who embody life path number 1 include: [21] X Research source Tom Hanks Drew Barrymore Nicolas Cage Miley Cyrus Kate Winslet

steps.title: A life path number is the key to understanding what’s at a person’s core.
steps.content: A life path number is the key to understanding what’s at a person’s core. Life path numbers derive from the study of numerology, and every person has a life path number according to their birth date. While they don’t dictate exactly how a person should be, your life path number can tell you a lot about your individual strengths, weaknesses, ambitions, and compatibility with others. [22] X Research source

steps.title: Life path numbers are calculated by reducing the numbers of your birth date.
steps.content: Life path numbers are calculated by reducing the numbers of your birth date. To calculate your life path number , add the numbers of your birth date’s month, day, and year and reduce them until you get a single digit. “Reducing” means adding the two digits of a double-digit number together until you get a single digit. So reducing the number 15 would involve adding 1 and 5 to get 6. First, start by reducing the month, day, and year to a single digit each. Next, add those three numbers together. Lastly, reduce the final sum until you get a single number. [23] X Research source To find the life path number of someone born on March 9, 1993, you would do the following calculations: Month : 3 Day : 9 Year (first reduction) : 1993 = 1 + 9 + 9 + 3 = 22 Year (second reduction) : 22 = 2 + 2 = 4 Life path number (first reduction) : 3 + 9 + 4 = 16 Life path number (final reduction) : 16 = 1 + 6 = 7 The life path number for someone born on March 9, 1993 would be 7.
